recommended_degree: Manajemen, Administrasi, Administrasi Bisnis, Teknik Industri (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Join us as a Production Admin Intern and support the production team in daily administrative activities. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Preparing travel forms based on weekly and daily production orders.
2. Updating the Production Monitoring Board.
3. Updating order monitoring records.
4. Printing and preparing electrical drawings for the production team.
5. Handling Work Order (WO) amendment distribution.

This position is suitable for graduates who want to learn production administration, documentation, and coordination in a manufacturing environment.
